subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham made his home debut for AC Milan, playing 81 minutes in a 1-0 victory over Fiorentina in the Italian league. Beckham is on loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy and hopes to stay sharp in hopes of earning a spot on the English national team.
